scripts.zip: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path pf2e-auto-action-tracker; Copy-Item -Path dist, public, module.json, README.md -Destination pf2e-auto-action-tracker -Recurse -Force; Compress-Archive -Path pf2e-auto-action-tracker -DestinationPath pf2e-auto-action-tracker.zip -Force; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force pf2e-auto-action-tracker"
